topics.body:
Guys.
What the fuck happened to the .Hack franchise?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5378cc81636872301b1d0100#post_5378cc81636872301b1d0100
I playedthat game.
It was very entertaining.

But, I have no idea what happened to it.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5378cde66368722f86770100#post_5378cde66368722f86770100
It seems like in the late 90's early 2000's .Hack was fuckin' everywhere. You couldn't walk down the street without someone talking about it. And then it just faded away. And now shit like Sword Art Online comes and just shits all over it's legacy.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: In case you're wondering, yes, I do have an inappropriate amount of images that are all just Scout crossdressing.

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/537909926368724545940100#post_537909926368724545940100
I still use DA but not as much anymore, I find it really hard to find pictures on there.

Plus DA's been giving me these stupid animated Ad Popups on the side of almost every image I go to.

And sometimes they have sound so imagine going through DA in the middle of the night with your speakers on _Full Blast_ and all of a sudden *"ONLY YOU CAN PREVENT FOREST FIRES!"*.
